contentrichtext.text: '''Rock Hill''' may refer to: * [[Rock Hill, Missouri]], small city in Missouri, population 5,000 * [[Rock Hill, New York]], hamlet in the state of New York, population 1,000 * [[Rock Hill, South Carolina]], fourth largest city in South Carolina, population 70,000 * The [[Aaron Copland House]], a National Historic Landmark in Cortlandt Manor, New York, also known as Rock Hill ==See also== * [[Rocky Hill (disambiguation)]] * [[Rocky Gap, Virginia]] * [[Rockville (disambiguation)]] {{geodis}} [[it:Rock Hill]]
